afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts

Class ERTMemoryLessPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts.ERTMemoryLessPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPoint<java.lang.String>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ERTMemoryLessTrainingPoint

    public class ERTMemoryLessPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPoint<java.lang.String>
    Creates a memory less point. Uses a hashMap where each key is a feature and each value is an arraylist of feature values for the whole signal to return the values of the point at a given index. Do not modify the HashMap as it is only referenced.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ERTMemoryLessPoint(int index, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> signalFeatures)
      Creates a new "memory less" point only storing the index of the point and a HashMap of all the features over the whole the signal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ERTMemoryLessPoint

        public ERTMemoryLessPoint(int index,
                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> signalFeatures)
        Creates a new "memory less" point only storing the index of the point and a HashMap of all the features over the whole the signal. When querying the point the value of the given feature at the given index is returned.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the point to get values from.
        signalFeatures - Map containing all features over the whole signal.
